attributes.action: restore the responsibility for renewing UK passports to the respective embassies/consulates for expatriates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Passports for expatriates were always renewed by the respective embassy / consulate in the country of residence of expatriates  and the new versions were ready in seven days maximum. Now there is a crazy system of EVERYTHING going through France for all European countries.
France is not even central in Europe and the Paris embassy does not answer the telephone, does not respond to faxes or email. The Website for this is not even in English as the default language! It is extremely inconvenient and subject to all sorts of delays as the fee structures are not clearly explained, thus anything other than the EXACT amount (even if too much)transferred will delay passport renewals.
